text:
Question 32) The Group The Magic Theater presents copyright compositions that have aesthetic references of rock, pop and Brazilian folk music. The originality of its shows is related to the nineteenth -century European opera from the
A) Scenic provision of artists in theatrical space.
B) Integration of various artistic languages.
C) Overlapping between music and literary text.
D) Maintenance of a dialogue with the public.
E) adoption of a plot like conductive thread.
